comments.author: Dave
comments.body: No sooner do I escape to Motown for a little well-earned high rolling than Rain Cloud Bailey has to douse my jib with this screechy jeremiad about all the hard work and suffering back home. Puh-leease; it's not as if I haven't served my time in Hell. Stick my battered nose outside the Gulag for a brief sniff of fresh air, and SB is all "_What about me?! I'm so overworked. I'm so unloved._" Gad... way to water down my Mai Tai, Cousin. By the way, we discovered that there's a volume break here on houses... they're cheaper by the block. Ronna and I just grabbed everything between 67th Avenue and Ross Parkway for $125. Can't wait to tell the kids. Gotta' run. There's shooting in the street again, and it takes a while to get down into the crawl space. DU
